{
    "title": "my event",
    "teaser": "This is a very fancy game",
    "description": "In this very fancy game, we will frolic and have fun",
    "requires_registration": true,
    "duration": 60,
    "min_attendees": 3,
    "max_attendees": 6,
    "notes_to_staff": null,
    "logistical_requirements": "Brooms, lots and lots of brooms",
    "notes_to_attendees": "Bring your dirt on, and don't forget to have a lot of fun",
    "scheduling_constraints": "I'm like, good, with like, whenever",
    "tags": {
        "event-type": "Role playing game",
        "age-restriction": "None",
        "taxonomy": [ "game", "rpg", "d&d" ]
    },
    "data": {
        "field": "This is just some custom field"
    }
}
